An Efficient Design for Chemical Structure Searching. I. The Screens .A Feldman, Alfred .A Hodes, Louis A method has been developed for generating efficient screens for chemical structures.. Fragments are generated by an algorithm under control of file statistics.. The fragments obtained are normalized by weighting their code patterns.. Superimposition of these codes yields the screen codes for the structures.. .X 124	1	708 125	1	708 127	2	708 129	2	708 190	1	708 191	1	708 197	1	708 211	1	708 214	1	708 218	1	708 243	1	708 307	1	708 330	1	708 363	1	708 378	1	708 432	1	708 450	1	708 451	1	708 452	1	708 459	1	708 460	1	708 461	1	708 468	1	708 484	1	708 492	1	708 508	1	708 511	1	708 512	1	708 514	1	708 518	1	708 520	1	708 523	1	708 524	1	708 525	1	708 526	1	708 529	1	708 530	1	708 534	1	708 546	1	708 553	1	708 579	1	708 580	1	708 594	1	708 603	1	708 604	1	708 606	1	708 609	1	708 610	1	708 611	1	708 612	1	708 622	1	708 625	1	708 626	1	708 630	1	708 636	1	708 637	1	708 642	2	708 643	2	708 644	2	708 645	1	708 646	1	708 648	1	708 649	1	708 650	2	708 670	3	708 671	2	708 692	1	708 696	1	708 699	3	708 700	1	708 703	1	708 705	1	708 708	6	708 709	1	708 726	1	708 727	1	708 728	1	708 731	1	708 732	1	708 733	1	708 734	1	708 736	2	708 737	2	708 738	2	708 739	2	708 740	1	708 741	2	708 742	1	708 743	1	708 744	1	708 755	1	708 820	1	708 826	1	708 827	1	708 879	1	708 883	1	708 1004	1	708 1035	1	708 1044	1	708 1078	1	708 1089	1	708 1091	1	708 1207	1	708 1261	1	708 1264	1	708 1297	1	708 1303	1	708 1356	1	708 1364	1	708 1368	1	708 1370	1	708 1372	1	708 1373	1	708 1374	2	708 1375	1	708 1376	2	708 1377	1	708 1377	1	708
